ADCB India Important Information

This is to inform you that Abu Dhabi Commercial Bank P.J.S.C. has ceased its operations in India. If you were an active account holder with ADCB India, then your account has been transferred to DCB Bank Limited (www.dcbbank.com). You are requested to contact the following at DCB Bank for any further queries on the same.

Attention: Mr. Manecksha Dee
Senior Manager – Liabilities
DCB Bank Limited
Nariman Point Branch,
Office no. 3, Ground Floor, Mittal Court, “B” Wing, Nariman Point
Mumbai 400 001, India
E-mail: nri@dcbbank.com Phone: +91 70345 00234

Details of unclaimed deposits may be viewed by clicking on this link.
